p: Information on the uniformity and the homogeneity of the analyzed samples is provided in Figure 1b,d,f. The SEM images are shown as 3D surface plots ( Figure 1b,d,f) of HAp, HAp-B and HAp-L samples obtained using Image J software (ImageJ 1.51j8, National Institutes of Health, Bethesda, MD, USA) [ 10] are also presented. The distribution of the HAp nanoparticles covered with EOs became non-uniform, and it seemed that the porosity of the HAp nanoparticles increased. An obvious increase in porosity was noticed for HAp-L samples, while a clear change in the porosity of HAp-B samples was not observed. This behavior could suggest that basil EO had poor adsorption on the surface of hydroxyapatite nanoparticles.
